name: test_e2e_with_logs[011_SQLI_ADV_085]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_085` |
| **Name** | Stacked Query DROP TABLE |
| **Category** | SQLI |

| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |
